mapper.select: WITH user_qna AS ( select "" as CMT_NO, QA_NO, NICKNAME, TITLE, CASE WHEN (CREATE_DATE >= CURDATE()-interval 7 DAY) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END as NEW_YN, CONTENT, PW, CREATE_DATE, ANSWER, MODIFY_DATE, HIT, IP FROM Q_BOARD ), user_cmt as ( select C.CMT_NO, Q.QA_NO, "관리자" as NICKNAME, "└ 답변 작성" as TITLE, CASE WHEN (C.CREATE_DATE >= CURDATE()-interval 7 DAY) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END as NEW_YN, C.CMT_CONTENT, Q.PW, C.CREATE_DATE, "" as ANSWER, C.MODIFY_DATE, "" as HIT, C.IP FROM smore.Q_BOARD Q left outer join smore.Q_CMT C ON Q.QA_NO = C.QA_NO WHERE C.STATE = '1' ) select sum(b.cnt) as cnt from (select count(*) as cnt from user_qna UNION ALL select count(*) as cnt from user_cmt) b
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Q_BOARD WHERE PW = #{pw} AND QA_NO = #{qaNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Q_BOARD (QA_NO, NICKNAME, TITLE, CONTENT, PW, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, HIT, IP, ANSWER) VALUES (#{qaNo}, #{nickname}, #{title}, #{content}, #{pw}, NOW(), NOW(), 0, #{ip}, #{answer})
INSERT INTO Q_CMT (CMT_NO, QA_NO, NICKNAME, CMT_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, STATE,IP) VALUES (#{cmtNo}, #{qaNo}, #{nickname}, #{cmtContent}, NOW(), NOW(), 1, #{ip})
mapper.select: SELECT Q.QA_NO, U.NICKNAME as nickname, Q.TITLE as title, Q.CONTENT as content, Q.PW as pw, Q.CREATE_DATE, Q.MODIFY_DATE as modifyDate, Q.HIT as hit, Q.IP as ip, Q.ANSWER as answer FROM USERS U INNER JOIN Q_BOARD Q ON U.NICKNAME = Q.NICKNAME WHERE Q.QA_NO = #{qaNo}
SELECT CMT_NO, QA_NO, NICKNAME, CMT_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, STATE, IP FROM Q_CMT WHERE STATE = '1' AND CMT_NO = #{cmtNo}

WITH user_qna AS ( select "" as CMT_NO, QA_NO, NICKNAME, TITLE, CASE WHEN (CREATE_DATE >= CURDATE()-interval 7 DAY) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END as NEW_YN, CONTENT, PW, CREATE_DATE, ANSWER, MODIFY_DATE, HIT, IP FROM smore.Q_BOARD ), user_cmt as ( select C.CMT_NO, Q.QA_NO, "관리자" as NICKNAME, "└ 답변 작성" as TITLE, CASE WHEN (C.CREATE_DATE >= CURDATE()-interval 7 DAY) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END as NEW_YN, C.CMT_CONTENT, Q.PW, C.CREATE_DATE, "" as ANSWER, C.MODIFY_DATE, "" as HIT, C.IP FROM smore.Q_BOARD Q left outer join smore.Q_CMT C ON Q.QA_NO = C.QA_NO WHERE C.STATE = '1' ) (select * from user_qna) UNION ALL (select * from user_cmt) ORDER BY QA_NO DESC, CMT_NO ASC LIMIT #{begin} OFFSET #{end}
